About Me

behind the screen

I am an aspiring software developer who enjoys building modern, clean, and accessible applications for the web. I am a self-taught developer who is passionate about problem solving. I love to code for fun.

Projects

here's what I have been working on

Covid 19 Tracker Web App

Source Code
ReactJs

Covid-19 Tracker is a Single Page Application built in ReactJs. Frontend was built using Material-UI,a React UI Library and is represented in the form of charts using Chartsjs library. Data wa real time fetched via API and classified on the basis of country.

My News Reader App

Source Code
ReactJs

My News Reader App is a SPA with integration of voice commands using Alan AI Voice Assistant. Frontend is built using Material-UI, a React UI Library, whereas News is fetched via API classified on the basis of Terminologies,Category and Source of News. Responses of the Voice Assistant which then also read the Highlights of News.

Electoral Portal

Source Code
PHP

A portal for voter's registration and login page wherein voter can login and download the PDF of Voter ID. Frontend was built using Bootstrap framework whereas Backend was based on PHP for database connectivity and creating structure of PDF file.
